author: MSNBC.com
title: ‘Personal cruelty’: Sen. Schatz on infected Trump returning to White House
description: “This is personal cruelty. This is a person who is sick, infecting others physically adjacent to him because he needs to fill the hole in his soul,” says Sen. Schatz of Pres. Trump returning to the White House despite his Covid-19 diagnosis.
source.name: MSNBC

author: Msnbc
title: Jason Johnson: ‘Donald Trump is his own negative ad’
description: Journalist and professor at Morgan State University Jason Johnson lauds Biden’s speech at Gettysburg, PA and argues that Biden does not need to attack Trump because the president’s ‘carelessness’ is enough.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Presidential historian: ‘Trump is so terrible he makes Hoover look like Gandhi’
description: Historian Michael Beschloss on the problem with trying to compare Pres. Trump to other presidents: “Trump is so terrible he makes Hoover look like Gandhi.”
source.name: MSNBC

title: Beto O’Rourke calls GOP voter suppression efforts in Texas ‘a sign of desperation’

author: MSNBC.com
title: ER Doc describes the horrific reality of dying from Covid-19
description: Dr. Rob Davidson, an emergency room doctor who called out the president's response to his Covid-19 diagnosis, explains the harsh reality of death by coronavirus.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Biden calls for national unity in his own Gettysburg address
description: Joe Biden took his socially-distanced campaign to Gettysburg, Pennsylvania, where he gave a speech calling for national unity calling out the president while never actually saying Trump's name. Jason Johnson reacts.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Covid-infected Trump attacks on Twitter as WH outbreak spreads
description: Back in the White House residence and back on Twitter, the president spent much of Tuesday attacking his critics on Twitter while Joe Biden called for unity in a speech at the historic Civil War battleground in Gettysburg, Pennsylvania.

title: Renee Graham: Biden understands that 'democracy remains unfulfilled for Black Americans'

title: Rep. Ocasio-Cortez warns of severe fallout as Trump rejects new Covid relief

title: New battleground polling shows Biden up in key states

title: Private concern grows after Trump flip-flops on relief measures

author: MSNBC.com
title: Trump sows confusion on stimulus talks
description: The president reversed course Tuesday night and urged Congress to approve coronavirus relief measures that he would sign, including a new round of $1,200 stimulus checks for Americans. Earlier he halted talks until 'after I win' the election.
source.name: MSNBC

title: Rev. Warnock now frontrunner in Ga. special Senate election

title: Trump WH creates climate where LGBTQ people are targeted, says HRC head

title: Senator points to difficulties in negotiating with Trump on relief

title: Two WH press assistants test positive for Covid-19

title: Trump enters Oval Office, breaking coronavirus isolation

title: Fmr. CIA Director Brennan on why he will not ‘relent in his criticism’ of Trump
description: Former Director of the CIA John Brennan explains the threat to national security that Trump poses as president and warns that Trump has “taken the pages out” of the playbooks of many authoritarian leaders he has observed
